lemma span_pow_le_span (P : Polynomial ) (m : ) (hm : 1 m) : Ideal.span ({P ^ m} : Set (Polynomial )) Ideal.span ({P} : Set (Polynomial )) := by classical refine (Ideal.span_singleton_le_iff_mem (I := Ideal.span ({P} : Set (Polynomial ))) (x := P ^ m)).2 ?_ refine (Ideal.mem_span_singleton).2 ?_ refine P ^ (m - 1), ?_ calc P ^ m = P ^ ((m - 1) + 1) := by simp [Nat.sub_add_cancel hm] _ = P ^ (m - 1) * P := by simp [pow_succ] _ = P * P ^ (m - 1) := by simp [mul_comm]
